original_title: SLT Digital Services to power e-commerce solution of Asian Hardware
original_body_lines: In a significant development that marks a new milestone in Sri Lanka’s e-commerce space, “Asian Hardware (Pte) Ltd” has chosen to collaborate with SLT Digital Services (Pvt) Limited (SLT-DIGITAL), a fully owned Marketing and Digital Engagement Solutions subsidiary of Sri Lanka Telecom PLC (SLT-MOBITEL group). This partnership brings together the expertise of “Asian Hardware (Pte) Ltd” in the hardware retail sector and the technological prowess of SLT Digital Services, renowned for its innovative digital solutions.

The decision to entrust their e-commerce solution to SLT Digital Services reflects the forward-thinking approach of “Asian Hardware (Pte) Ltd.” Recognizing the growing importance of online commerce in today’s business landscape, the company is taking proactive steps to enhance its digital presence and provide customers with an unparalleled online shopping experience. “We are thrilled to announce our partnership with SLT Digital Services for our e-commerce venture,” said Dr. M. H. A. Razzak, Chairman at Asian Hardware (Pte) Ltd.

“In an era where technology is reshaping how businesses operate, we believe that this collaboration will empower us to serve our customers better and more conveniently than ever before.” said Mr. A. R. M. Yasheer, Managing Director at Asian Hardware (Pte) Ltd.

SLT Digital Services brings a wealth of experience in creating and implementing digital solutions that drive business growth. Their commitment to innovation and client success aligns perfectly with the goals of “Asian Hardware (Pte) Ltd,” ensuring a seamless and customer-centric e-commerce platform.
